backend/main.mo: Defines core hotel booking actor with data types, storage maps, authorization mixins, and initial admin principal setup.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of key frontend source files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global OKLCH-based color variables and Tailwind layers for light/dark theming.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting metadata, favicon, and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Regression testing checklist covering auth/roles, hotel browsing, hotel management, admin workflows, and guest account functionality.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, auth/role gates, and global providers like QueryClient and LocaleProvider.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the build version constant used for display and deployment verification.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays all bookings in a table with status, totals, and a details dialog, using a bookings query.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Lists hotels with controls to toggle active status and update subscription type, using related mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Allows admins to generate invite tokens bound to a hotel's principal and view/copy existing tokens.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an accessâ€‘denied message with role requirements and optionally displays the hotel activation form.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Displays an error when permission checks fail and provides retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Validates and consumes invite tokens to activate a hotel account with success feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Shows a forced profile setup dialog for authenticated users without a profile and saves basic user info.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps children with an authentication check and prompts Internet Identity login if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Enforces role-based access control with admin bypass and optional hotel activation checks.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Displays detailed booking information in a dialog with optional user principal copying and payment proof status.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Form for creating a room booking, validating dates and guests before submitting a booking request.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Renders a badge showing booking status with variant and label mapping.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Shows a table of the user's bookings with status, pricing, and access to the details dialog.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Modal dialog for displaying a large preview of an image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Debug panel showing authentication state, user role, admin status, and hotel activation with status icons.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Displays a table of hotel bookings with details, status badges, and booking detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Manages hotel payment methods, allowing adding and removing methods with form inputs and server mutations.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Form for viewing and updating hotel profile details including name, location, address, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Lists eligible bookings for stay completion and allows marking them as completed.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Renders room photos with fallback handling and supports both compact and full gallery layouts.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: UI for listing, creating, and editing hotel rooms with image uploads and form dialog management.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Displays hotel subscription and activation status with badges and contextual alerts.
Provides the main application layout with top navigation, content area, and footer showing build info.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: A language dropdown allowing the user to switch the app locale, currently only English.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar showing links based on authentication, role, and hotel profile status with login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Admin contact card for hotel activation/subscription with WhatsApp, email, and payment method details.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays a hotel's payment methods and provides contact buttons for WhatsApp or email.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on authentication, auto-refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors to fetch and mutate user roles, profiles, admin actions, and invite tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Implements a hook to upload or process room images as data URLs with progress tracking.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Creates a locale context with persistence in localStorage and a hook to access and update the current locale.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme colors and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Renders user account status, roles, invite token handling, and admin actions with data fetched via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Displays admin tools including invite token management, hotel visibility, and bookings panels.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Shows a grid of available hotels with image previews, handling loading states and image errors.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Guest account dashboard showing booking management and navigation to browsing hotels or viewing account status.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Hotel management hub with profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription tabs, with loading and missing-profile handling.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Hotel detail view showing hotel info, rooms, photos, payment methods, and booking options with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Main landing menu directing users to guest or hotel portals based on authentication, role, and hotel activation status.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: Page listing the user's bookings with shortcuts to browse hotels or view account status.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Extended TypeScript interfaces mirroring backend data structures for hotels, rooms, bookings, tokens, and API methods.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Utility enabling debug mode in development or via a URL parameter.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Currency utilities for formatting amounts and validating supported currencies.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Helpers for validating, filtering, and tracking room picture URLs for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash for routing and token handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, known regressions, and required feature restorations related to UI behavior and token generation.
